sceneConfig.hint: Configure the About Face settings for this scene.

scene-enabled.name: Enable on this scene
scene-enabled.hint: Rotates tokens when moving them (except when locked). If disabled, can still hold SHIFT to rotate in place

lockRotation.name: Lock Rotation
lockRotation.hint: Tokens created in this scene will have the Lock Rotation Token Configuration toggled on.

lockArrowRotation.name: Lock Indicator Rotation
lockArrowRotation.hint: The indicator won't change when a token moves. Use SHIFT + direction key to rotate the indicator.

options.changeEverySceneDialog: Would you like to change this setting on every scene?

arrowColor.name: Indicator Color
arrowColor.hint: Select a color for the indicator. Transparency is ignored.

arrowDistance.name: Indicator Distance
arrowDistance.hint: Set the multiplier for the indicator's distance. Math: Highest Size x (Multiplier / 2).

lockArrowRotation.name: Lock Indicator Rotation
lockArrowRotation.hint: Every scene will be created with the About Face's Lock Indicator Rotation setting toggled on. The indicator won't change when a token moves in such a scene. Use SHIFT + direction key to rotate the indicator.

lockArrowToFace.name: Snap Indicator to Closest Tile
lockArrowToFace.hint: Snaps the indicator's direction to the closest tile it would be facing instead of the direction of the movement's angle. This setting is ignored if 'Lock Indicator Rotation' is on.

lockRotation.name: Lock Rotation
lockRotation.hint: Every scene will be created with the About Face's Lock Rotation setting toggled on. Tokens created in such a scene will have the Lock Rotation Token Configuration toggled on.

lockVisionToRotation.name: Lock Vision to Rotation
lockVisionToRotation.hint: The token's vision will follow its rotation instead of its indicator. Useful for games with Vision Angles. SHIFT + direction key overrides this setting. This setting is ignored if "Flip or Rotate Token" isn't set to "Rotate".

rememberTokenPrevPos.name: Step Back / Remember Token's Previous Position
rememberTokenPrevPos.hint: If a token moves to its previous position, its indicator won't change. Useful for games with Vision Angles.

tokenAutoRotateOptInPerMovement.name: Token rotation is opt in per movement
tokenAutoRotateOptInPerMovement.hint: Token will not auto rotate unless "z" key is pressed during movement. Useful for games with Vision Angles.

enable-indicator.name: Enable token indicators
enable-indicator.hint: Adds an indicator for direction to tokens

flip-or-rotate.name: Flip or Rotate Token
flip-or-rotate.hint: Instead of rotating a token, flip it

facing-direction.name: Facing Direction
facing-direction.hint: The default direction tokens are facing

choices.hex: Hex Indicator (Only works on Hex Columns)
